enchantment.creatures_from_the_snow.hoof: Allows reindeer to fly at night. Only works on Leather horse armor.
enchantment.creatures_from_the_snow.rein: Increases movement speed of the reindeer. Only works on Leather horse armor.
enchantment.medievalorigins.featherweigh: Allows the Elf and Arachnae origins to wear heavier armor.
